title: Wilderness Nature Loops
description: Embark on an immersive journey through the wonders of nature with Wilderness Nature Loops.
longDescription:
Audio demo


This game ambience loop sound library features 200 meticulously crafted ambient audio loops, capturing the essence of serene landscapes from Germany, Greece, and the USA. From the gentle rustle of leaves to the symphony of birdsong, each sound is expertly edited to enhance your project's atmosphere. With organized folders covering forests, oceans, and mountains, creating lifelike backgrounds for your games or films has never been easier. Plus, with UCS compliance and Soundminer metadata, finding the perfect sound is effortless. Let Wilderness Nature Loops elevate your creations with the soothing sounds of the wilderness.


  • 200 nature audio loops
  • 3.7GB of audio samples
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav


Embark on an epic journey through the wonders of nature with Wilderness Nature Loops. This comprehensive collection of 200 ambient audio loops is your key to unlocking the unparalleled beauty and diversity of the natural world. The result of six months of intensive field recording expeditions across Germany, Greece, and the USA, each sound in this library has been meticulously captured and edited to perfection. From the gentle rustle of leaves to the distant call of a mountain stream, every sound is a testament to the awe-inspiring beauty of our planet. Whether you're traversing the serene landscapes of the Bavarian forests or exploring the rugged terrain of the American West, Wilderness Nature Loops transports you to the heart of nature with unparalleled realism and immersion.


What’s Included? 


This pack has plenty of options to help your game background & ambience sound come to life. From the melodic chirping of birds to the gentle babbling of creeks, Wilderness Nature Loops offers a diverse range of sounds to enrich any environment. Organized into easily accessible folders by genre, including Birds, Countryside, Creek, Forest, Mountain, Lake, Night, Ocean, Rain, Thunder, River, Stream, Water Swells, Waterfalls, and Wind, this library provides endless possibilities for creating lifelike backgrounds in games, films, and more.


Unrivaled Depth and Variety


Boasting an impressive 3.7GB of audio samples of ambient sound, this treasure trove offers an unparalleled depth and variety tailored specifically for game developers. Whether your quest leads you to the tranquil depths of a forest glade, where the whispers of ancient trees mingle with the songs of hidden creatures, or to the heart of a raging storm, where lightning crackles and thunder booms with electrifying intensity, Wilderness Nature Loops has you covered.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata


Furthermore, Wilderness Nature Loops is UCS compliant and includes Soundminer metadata, making it easy to search and organize your sound library. With descriptive file names and intuitive folder structures, finding the perfect sound has never been easier.


Product details 

  • 200 nature audio loops
  • Game Ambience Loop Sound Library
  • 3.7GB of audio samples
  • Most files are 60-120 seconds long (all seamlessly loop-able)
  • Includes Soundminer metadata for easy search capability
  • UCS Compliant
  • 14 birdsong loops
  • 4 farm ambience loops
  • 2 fireplace loops
  • 33 various forest loops
  • 29 insect loops - night, countryside, field etc.
  • 21 ocean loops
  • 26 rain loops - canvas, concrete, general
  • 6 river loops
  • 14 storm loops
  • 3 swamp loops
  • 14 calm town & countryside loops
  • 18 water flow loops - underwater, pipe drain, creak, stream & more
  • 12 waterside loops - riverside, waves by rocks, distant ocean, mountain waterside
  • 4 wind loops
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty-free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
